properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oppukonti oppukonti na tappidamulanni cheppi cheppi yesuto oppukonti oppukonti 1{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Udayamunanelechi gannchiti pogabandi yerparacha badina varike tagubandi Adi vini cheppiti vacheda papini manninnchumani nenu morapettitini prabhuto{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sundaramagu mandiramunaku nechera _chuchiti mari vinti balabalura madhya Yerparacha badina vadavena nivu? Etu chuchinanu gani okate svaramu vinti{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Satyamugala bodha vippenu na gatha mutyamulagu mata telpena prabhu badha Getsemane totan edciceppina mata chatinnchedanu prabhuva prakatintu pratichota{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gorreemandala gache adavilo mana moshe morrapettucu gadipe sarvamu vide moshe Sarvakalasala jnanamenduku naku sarvavyapti divyasvarame calane mose{/lang-eng}
